data.chText: （尤指有风险的）企业，商业，投机活动，经营项目
data.enText: a business project or activity, especially one that involves taking risks

data.chText: 一个彻底失败的经营项目使他损失严重。
data.enText: A disastrous business venture lost him thousands of dollars.

data.chText: 敢于去（危险或令人不快的地方）
data.enText: to go somewhere even though you know that it might be dangerous or unpleasant

data.chText: 他们神经紧张地硬着头皮下水。
data.enText: They ventured nervously into the water.

data.chText: 他一生中从来不敢出国。
data.enText: He's never ventured abroad in his life.

data.chText: 小心地说，谨慎地做（尤指会使人烦恼或不快的事）
data.enText: to say or do sth in a careful way, especially because it might upset or offend sb
She hardly dared to venture an opinion.

data.chText: 我小心地提醒说她可能出了差错。
data.enText: I ventured to suggest that she might have made a mistake.

data.chText: “那么我要是说不呢？”她试探说。
data.enText: ‘And if I say no?’ she ventured.

data.chText: 冒着（失去贵重或重要的东西）的危险
data.enText: to risk losing sth valuable or important if you are not successful at sth

data.chText: 他以自己稳定的财政作赌注去做风险这么大的交易是错误的。
data.enText: It was wrong to venture his financial security on such a risky deal.
nothing ventured, nothing gained

data.chText: 不敢冒险就一事无成；不入虎穴，焉得虎子
data.enText: used to say that you have to take risks if you want to achieve things and be successful
venture into/on sth
to do sth, even though it involves risks

data.chText: 这是这家公司首次涉足电影制作。
data.enText: This is the first time the company has ventured into movie production.

word_means: 企业，商业，投机活动，经营项目
simple_means.memory_skill: ven 来 + ture 行为，行为的结果 →〔危险〕来到 → 冒险

means: (尤指有风险的)企业，商业，投机活动，经营项目
敢于去(危险或令人不快的地方)
小心地说，谨慎地做(尤指会使人烦恼或不快的事)
冒着(失去贵重或重要的东西)的危险

ex.chText: 他还是小孩子的时候，从不敢在晚上外出。
ex.enText: He never ventured out at night when he was a child.

ex.chText: 有人在敲门，她犹豫了一下，然后大着胆子下楼，走向门口。
ex.enText: Someone was knocking, and she paused before venturing downstairs to the door.
It's very bold of you to venture to do so.

synonyms.bx: 指冒风险试一试，或是去可能会有危险的地方，或是做有风险的事。

ex.chText: 那个逃跑的奴隶决定留在山洞里，因为他不敢冒险被人发现。
ex.enText: The runaway slave decided to stay in the cave because he couldn't chance being found.

ex.chText: 他不知道另一条路线是不是能节省更多的时间，但是他决定冒一下险。
ex.enText: He was not sure if another route could save him more time, but he decided to chance it.

synonyms.bx: 指做自己觉得可能有风险的事情。

ex.chText: 粗心大意的驾驶者拿乘客和自己的生命冒险。
ex.enText: Careless drivers hazard passengers' lives as well as their own.
I wouldn't like to hazard a guess.

synonyms.bx: 指为获得某物而冒失去钱财等的风险，也指冒险猜测、建议等。

ex.chText: 难道你不认为吸烟者其实是在拿自己的健康去冒险吗？
ex.enText: Don't you think that smokers are actually risking their own health?

ex.chText: 那名政客准备不惜一切来避免离婚。
ex.enText: That politician has prepared to risk everything to avoid divorce.

ex.chText: 如果不能得到那笔贷款，他们就有可能失去公司。
ex.enText: If they cannot get that loan, they may risk losing the company.

ex.chText: 你可以编个迟到的理由，但我不想冒这个险。
ex.enText: You could make up a reason for being late, but I wouldn't risk it.

synonyms.bx: 指使遭受失去、毁坏、伤害等风险或承担此类风险去做某事，也指做有危险或不好结果的事。

d: 使…冒风险；冒…的风险；冒险做

ex.chText: 我对他们讲述了我在北极的冒险经历。
ex.enText: I told them of my adventure at the North Pole.

ex.chText: 他的生活中充满了冒险。
ex.enText: His life was full of adventures.

synonyms.bx: 指激动人心的、奇怪的、危险的经历。

ex.enText: Jack is a man of great enterprise.

synonyms.bx: 指思考新活动、新想法等并使之可行的探索能力。

ex.chText: 你对她最新的写作尝试有何看法？
ex.enText: What is your opinion about her latest writing venture?

synonyms.bx: 指有风险的投资或活动。

data.enText: nothing ventured, nothing gained

data.chText: 不敢冒险就一事无成；不入虎穴，焉得虎子
data.enText: used to say that you have to take risks if you want to achieve things and be successful
venture into/on sth
to do sth, even though it involves risks

data.chText: 这是这家公司首次涉足电影制作。
data.enText: This is the first time the company has ventured into movie production.

tr: any venturesome undertaking especially one with an uncertain outcome
a commercial undertaking that risks a loss but promises a profit
an investment that is very risky but could yield great profits
example: he knew the stock was a speculation when he bought it

tr: put forward, of a guess, in spite of possible refutation
example: I am guessing that the price of real estate will rise again
I cannot pretend to say that you are wrong

tr: proceed somewhere despite the risk of possible dangers
example: We ventured into the world of high-tech and bought a supercomputer
I will stake my good reputation for this

value.def: A venture is a project or activity which is new, exciting, and difficult because it involves the risk of failure.
value.tran: 风险项目（或活动);冒险事业

value.def: If you venture somewhere, you go somewhere that might be dangerous.

example.ex: People are afraid to venture out for fear of sniper attacks...
example.tran: 由于害怕狙击手，人们不敢冒险外出。

example.ex: Few Europeans who had ventured beyond the Himalayas had returned to tell the tale.
example.tran: 少数几个冒险翻越了喜马拉雅山的欧洲人回来后讲述了这个故事。

value.def: If you venture a question or statement, you say it in an uncertain way because you are afraid it might be stupid or wrong.

example.tran: “那么你就是列奥的女朋友了？”他大胆问道。

example.ex: He ventured that plants draw part of their nourishment from the air...
example.tran: 他大胆提出植物从空气中吸收部分养分的观点。

example.ex: Stephen ventured a few more sentences in halting Welsh.
example.tran: 在阻止韦尔什时，斯蒂芬壮着胆子多说了几句。

value.tran: 斗胆提出（问题）;冒险发表（陈述）

value.def: If you venture to do something that requires courage or is risky, you do it.

example.ex: 'Don't ask,' he said, whenever Ginny ventured to raise the subject.
example.tran: 每当金尼鼓起勇气提起这个话题时，他就说“不要问”。

value.def: If you venture into an activity, you do something that involves the risk of failure because it is new and different.

example.ex: He enjoyed little success when he ventured into business.
example.tran: 他冒险涉足商界后几乎没有取得什么成功。

trans: 风险资本(投入新公司的资金，风险很大)
冒险公司；风险企业；创业公司；风险投资公司；创业企业
中外合资企业；中外合资
风险投资者；投机资本家
企业；商业投机；创新创业
风险资本公司；风险投资公司
合资合同；合资企业合同；企业合同；中外合作经营合同；合资经营合同
冒险企业，投机企业；投机经营
合资合同；合资合约；合资协议；协议；合营企业协议

partsOfSpeech.dec: ad 加强 + vent 来 → 来到
advent 到来 + itious …的 →〔突然〕来到的 → 偶然的
ad 加强 + venture 冒险；冒险行动 → 冒险
adventur〔e〕冒险 + ous 有…性质的，关于…的 → 爱冒险的
a 加强 + ven 来 + ue → 让人们可以走来走去 → 大路
contra 反对；相反；对比 + ven 来 + e → 反着来 → 违反
con 共同 + ven 来 + e → 都来到一起 → 召集
con 共同 + ven 来 + ience 表状态 → 全部能来没有障碍 → 方便
con 共同 + vent 来 + ion 表名词 → 大家来到一起 → 集会
e 出 + vent 来 → 出来的事 → 事件
event 事件 + ful …的 → 事件多的 → 多变故的
partsOfSpeech.d: 发生许多事情的；多变故的

partsOfSpeech.dec: event 事件 + ual 有…性质的 → 出事〔之后〕→ 最终的
inter 在…之间 + ven 来 + e → 走到中间来 → 干涉
in 使… + vent 来 → 使…出来 → 发明出
in 进入 + vent 来 + ory 表物 → 进来的〔全部财产〕→ 财产清单
pre 预先 + vent 来 → 预先来到 → 抢先一步，防止别人先到 → 防止
re 回 + ven 来 + ue → 回来的东西 → 收入
ven 来 + ture 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 →〔危险〕来到 → 冒险
